resources.string: By definition, Encryption is the process of transforming plain text into cipher text so that can not be read by any one rather than sender or receiver as intended. Due to great revolution of technology, encryption flaws increased. One of the flaws is this, encrypt key can be stolen since it transferred over long path, hence when it paths it different communication pipeline can be decrypted by powerful computers. In algorithm of cryptography, encryption key is shared by both sender and receiver. There fore it can be easily to be stolen.

Asthma is a condition which a person airways become inflammed,narrow and swell and produce extra mucus which makes it difficult to breath Asthma can be minor or it can interfere with daily activities .In some cases, it may lead to a life threatening attack
 SYMPTOMS
 Shortness of breath 

Chest tightness or pain 

Wheezing when exhaling , mostly in children
 Trouble sleeping caused by shortness of breath,coughing,or wheezing 
 Frequent cough especially at night

TREATMENT
 Asthma can usually be managed with rescue inhalers to treat symptoms and controller inhalers that prevent symptoms.

A stroke occurs when the blood supply to part of your brain is interrupted or reduced, preventing brain tissue from getting oxygen and nutrients. Brain cells begin to die in minutes. A stroke is a medical emergency, and prompt treatment is crucial. Early action can reduce brain damage and other complications.
